original: pañcavidhaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhārammaṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sutārammaṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ, mutārammaṇaṃ

original: Vatthuto chabbidhaṃ. Kathaṃ? Cakkhuviññāṇassa cakkhumeva vatthu, tathā sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇānaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyavatthu, avasesattayassa hadayavatthumevāti.
analyzed: vatthutaḥ chabbidham katham cakkhu viññāṇassa cakkhum eva vatthu tathā sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇānam sota ghāna jivhā kāya vatthu avasesa ttayassa hadaya vatthum eva ati

original: Ārammaṇato sattavidhaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Rūpārammaṇameva cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tathā saddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇāni
analyzed: ārammaṇato sattavidham hoti katham rūpa ārammaṇam eva cakkhu viññāṇam tathā sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabba ārammaṇāni

original: paṭipāṭiyā sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni, rūpādipañcārammaṇā manodhātu, sesamanoviññāṇadhātudvayaṃ chaḷārammaṇanti.

original: Taṃ sabbaṃ pana ahetukavipākacittaṃ kiccato aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Dassanakiccaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, savanaghāyanasāyanaphusanasampaṭicchanasantīraṇatadārammaṇakiccāni avasesāni.

saddahana lakkhaṇā pasādana rasā udaka ppasāda kamaṇi viya akālusiya paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Saranti etāya, sayaṃ vā sarati, saraṇamattameva vā esāti sati. Sā apilāpanalakkhaṇā, asammosarasā, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā, thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: saranti etāya sayam vā sarati saraṇa mattam eva vā esā ati sati sā apilāpana lakkhaṇā asammosa rasā ārakkha paccupaṭṭhānā thira saññā padaṭṭhānā

original: Vīrabhāvo vīriyaṃ. Vīrānaṃ vā kammaṃ vīriyaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ ussāhanalakkhaṇaṃ, sahajātānaṃ upatthambhanarasaṃ, asaṃsīdanabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vīra bhāvaḥ vīriyam vīrānam vā kammam vīriyam tam pana etam ussāhana lakkhaṇam sahajātānam upatthambhana rasam a saṃsīdana bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam saṃvega padaṭṭhānam

original: Pajānātīti paññā. Sā panesā vijānanalakkhaṇā, visayobhāsanarasā padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā araññagatasudesako viya.
analyzed: pajānāti iti paññā sā pana isā vijānana lakkhaṇā visaya ubhāsana rasā padīpaḥ viya asammoha paccupaṭṭhānā arañña gata sudesakaḥ viya

original: Jīvanti tena taṃsampayuttadhammāti jīvitaṃ. Taṃ pana attanā avinibbhuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ
analyzed: jīvanti tena tad sampayutta dhammā ati jīvitam tam pana attanā a vinibbhuttānam dhammānam

original: anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ, tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ, tesaṃyeva ṭhapanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, yāpayitabbadhammapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: anupālana lakkhaṇam tesam pavattana rasam tesam yeva ṭhapana paccupaṭṭhānam yāpayitabba dhamma padaṭṭhānam

original: Santepi ca tesaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ te dhamme anupāleti
analyzed: sante api ca tesam anupālana lakkhaṇa ādimhi vidhāne atthi kkhaṇe iva tam te dhamme anupāleti

original: udakaṃ viya uppalādīni, yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannepi ca dhamme anupāleti dhāti viya
analyzed: udakam viya uppala ādīni yathāsakam paccaya uppanne pi ca dhamme anupāleti dhāti viya

original: kumāraṃ, sayaṃpavattitadhammasambandheneva pavattati niyāmako viya, na bhaṅgato uddhaṃ
analyzed: kumāram sayaṃpavattita dhamma sambandhena iva pavattati niyāmakaḥ viya na bhaṅgataḥ uddham

original: pavattayati attano ca pavattayitabbānañca abhāvā, na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapeti sayaṃ bhijjamānattā
analyzed: pavattayati ca pavattayitabbānam ca abhāvā na bhaṅga kkhaṇe ṭhapeti sayam bhijjamāna ttā
khīyamānaḥ viya

original: Na lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā na lubbhati, alubbhanamattameva vā tanti alobho. So ārammaṇe
analyzed: na lubbhanti tena sayam vā na lubbhati alubbhana mattam eva vā alobho so ārammaṇe

original: cittassa alaggabhāvalakkhaṇo kamaladale jalabindu viya, apariggaharaso muttabhikkhu
analyzed: cittassa a lagga bhāva lakkhaṇaḥ kamala dale jala bindu viya a pariggaha rasaḥ mutta bhikkhu
viya an allīna bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno asucimhi patita puriso viya

original: Na dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā na dussati, adussanamattameva vā tanti adoso. So acaṇḍikkalakkhaṇo,
analyzed: na dussanti tena sayam vā na dussati a dussana mattam eva vā a doso saḥ a caṇḍikka lakkhaṇo

original: avirodhalakkhaṇo vā anukūlamitto viya, āghātavinayanaraso, pariḷāhavinayanaraso vā
analyzed: avirodha lakkhaṇo vā anukūla mittaḥ viya āghāta vinayana raso pariḷāha vinayana rasaḥ vā
candanam viya somma bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno puṇṇa candaḥ viya

original: Kāyaduccaritādīhi hirīyatīti hirī. Lajjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tehiyeva ottappatīti ottappaṃ.
analyzed: kāya duccarita ādīhi hirīyati iti hirī adhivacanam ottappati iti ottappam

original: Pāpato ubbegassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tattha pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī, ottāsalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: pāpataḥ ubbegassa itam adhivacanam tattha pāpataḥ jigucchana lakkhaṇā hirī ottāsa lakkhaṇam

original: ottappaṃ. Ubhopi pāpānaṃ akaraṇarasā, pāpato saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānā, attagāravaparagāravapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: uttappam ubho pi pāpānam a karaṇa rasā pāpataḥ saṅkocana paccupaṭṭhānā atta gārava para gārava padaṭṭhānā
ime dhammā lokapālā ti daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyapassambhanaṃ kāyapassaddhi. Cittapassambhanaṃ cittapassaddhi. Kāyoti cettha vedanādayo
analyzed: kāya passambhanam kāya passaddhi citta passambhanam citta passaddhi kāyo ti ca ittha vedanā ādayaḥ

original: tayo khandhā. Ubhopi panetā ekato hutvā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā, kāyacittadarathanimmadanarasā,
analyzed: tayo khandhāḥ ubho pi panetā ekatas hutvā kāya cit tada ratha vūpasama lakkhaṇā kāya cit tada ratha nimmadana rasā
kāya cittānam a paripphandana sīti bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā kāya cittānam
a vūpasama tā auddhacca ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati veditabbā

original: Kāyalahubhāvo kāyalahutā. Cittalahubhāvo cittalahutā. Kāyacittānaṃ garubhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāya lahu bhāvaḥ kāya lahu tā citta lahu bhāvaḥ citta lahu tā kāya cittānam garu bhāva vūpasama lakkhaṇā
kāya citta garu bhāva nimmadana rasā kāya cittānam adandha tā paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā
kāya cittānam veditabbā

original: Kāyamudubhāvo kāyamudutā. Cittamudubhāvo cittamudutā. Kāyacittānaṃ thaddhabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāya mudu bhāvaḥ kāya mudu tā citta mudu bhāvaḥ citta mudu tā kāya cittānam thaddha bhāva vūpasama lakkhaṇā
kāya cittānam thaddha bhāva nimmadana rasā appaṭighāta paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā
kāya cittānam thaddha bhāva kara diṭṭhi māna ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati veditabbā
kāya kammañña bhāvaḥ kāya kammañña tā citta kammañña bhāvaḥ citta kammañña tā kāya cittānam
a kammañña bhāva vūpasama lakkhaṇā kāya cittānaṃ a kammañña bhāva nimmadana rasā kāya cittānaṃ
ārammaṇa karaṇa sampatti paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānam kāya cittānam akammañña bhāva kara avasesa nīvaraṇa ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati veditabbā

original: Kāyapāguññabhāvo kāyapāguññatā. Cittapāguññabhāvo cittapāguññatā. Kāyacittānaṃ agelaññabhāvalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāya pāguñña bhāvaḥ kāya pāguñña tā citta pāguñña bhāvaḥ citta pāguñña tā kāya cittānaṃ a gelañña bhāva lakkhaṇā
kāya cittānam gelañña nimmadana rasāḥ nirādīnava paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā
kāya cittānam gelañña bhāva kara assaddha ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa ujukabhāvo kāyujukatā. Cittassa ujukabhāvo cittujukatā. Kāyacittānaṃ akuṭilabhāvalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāyassa ujuka bhāvo kāya ujuka tā cittassa ujuka bhāvo citta ujuka tā kāya cittānaṃ akuṭila bhāva lakkhaṇā

original: kāyacittānaṃ ajjavalakkhaṇā vā, kāyacittānaṃ kuṭilabhāvanimmadanarasā, ajimhatāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: kāya cittānam vā kāya cittānam kuṭila bhāva nimmadana rasāḥ a jimha tā paccupaṭṭhānā
kāya citta padaṭṭhānā kāya cittānam kuṭila bhāva kara māyā sāṭheyya ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Chandoti kattukamyatāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā so kattukamyatālakkhaṇo chando, ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, ārammaṇena atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno, tadevassa padaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: chandaḥ ti adhivacanam tasmā saḥ kattu kamya tā lakkhaṇaḥ chandaḥ ārammaṇa pariyesana rasaḥ ārammaṇena atthika tā paccupaṭṭhāno tad evassa padaṭṭhāno

original: Adhimuccanaṃ adhimokkho. So sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo, asaṃsappanaraso, nicchayapaccupaṭṭhāno, sanniṭṭheyyadhammapadaṭṭhāno, ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena indakhīlo viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: adhimuccanam adhimokkhaḥ so sanniṭṭhāna lakkhaṇaḥ a saṃsappana rasaḥ nicchaya paccupaṭṭhānaḥ sanniṭṭheyya dhamma padaṭṭhānaḥ ārammaṇe niccala bhāvena inda khīlaḥ viya daṭṭhabbo

original: Tesu tesu dhammesu majjhattabhāvo tatramajjhattatā. Sā cittacetasikānaṃ samavāhitalakkhaṇā, ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā, pakkhapātupacchedanarasā vā, majjhattabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: tesu tesu dhammesu majjhatta bhāvo tatra majjhatta tā sā citta cetasikānam samavāhita lakkhaṇā ūna adhika tā nivāraṇa rasā pakkhapāta upacchedana rasā vā majjhatta bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Kiriyā kāro, manasmiṃ kāro manasikāro. Purimamanato visadisaṃ manaṃ karotīti ca manasikāro.
analyzed: kiriyā kāraḥ manasmim kāraḥ manasikāraḥ purima manataḥ visadisam manam karoti iti ca manasikāraḥ

original: Svāyaṃ ārammaṇapaṭipādako, vīthipaṭipādako, javanapaṭipādakoti tippakāro. Tattha
analyzed: ārammaṇa paṭipādakaḥ vīthi paṭipādakaḥ javana paṭipādakaḥ ti tippakāro tattha

original: ārammaṇapaṭipādako manasmiṃ kāro manasikāro. So sāraṇalakkhaṇo, sampayuttānaṃ ārammaṇe
analyzed: ārammaṇa paṭipādakaḥ manasmim kāraḥ manasikāro so sāraṇa lakkhaṇo sampayuttānam ārammaṇe
saṃyojana rasaḥ ārammaṇa abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno ārammaṇa padaṭṭhāno saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpanno

original: ārammaṇapaṭipādakattena sampayuttānaṃ sārathī viya daṭṭhabbo. Vīthipaṭipādakoti pañcadvārāvajjanassetaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇa paṭipādaka ttena sampayuttānam sārathī viya daṭṭhabbaḥ vīthi paṭipādakaḥ ti pañca dvāra āvajjanassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ, javanapaṭipādakoti manodvārāvajjanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, na te idha adhippetā.
analyzed: adhivacanam javana paṭipādakaḥ ti adhivacanam na te idha adhippetā

original: Karuṇāti paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā, kināti vināseti
analyzed: karuṇā ati para dukkhe sati sādhūnam hadaya kampanam karoti iti karuṇā

original: vā paradukkhanti karuṇā. Sā paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā, paradukkhāsahanarasā,
analyzed: vā para dukkhanti karuṇā sā para dukkha apanayana ākāra ppavatti lakkhaṇā para dukkha asahana rasā
avihiṃsā paccupaṭṭhānā dukkha abhibhūtānam anātha bhāva dassana padaṭṭhānā

original: Modanti tāya, sayaṃ vā modatīti muditā. Sā pamodanalakkhaṇā, anissāyanarasā, arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: modanti tāya sayam vā modati iti muditā sā pamodana lakkhaṇā a nissāyana rasā a rati vighāta paccupaṭṭhānā

original: sattānaṃ sampattidassanapadaṭṭhānā. Keci pana mettupekkhāyopi aniyate icchanti, taṃ
analyzed: sattānam sampatti dassana padaṭṭhānā keci pana mettupekkhāyaḥ api aniyate icchanti tam

original: na gahetabbaṃ. Atthato hi adoso eva mettā, tatramajjhattupekkhāyeva upekkhāti.
analyzed: na gahetabbam atthataḥ hi adosaḥ eva mettā tatram ajjhatta upekkhāya iva upekkhāti

original: Kāyaduccaritato virati kāyaduccaritavirati. Eseva nayo sesesupi dvīsu. Lakkhaṇādito
analyzed: kāya duccaritataḥ virati kāya duccarita virati esa iva nayo sesesu pi dvīsu lakkhaṇa ādito

original: pana etā tissopi viratiyo kāyaduccaritādivatthūnaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇā, kāyaduccaritādivatthuto
analyzed: pana etāḥ tissaḥ api viratiyaḥ kāya duccarita ādi vatthūnam avītikkama lakkhaṇā kāya duccarita ādi vatthuto
saṅkocana rasā akiriya paccupaṭṭhānā saddhā hiri uttappa appiccha tā ādi guṇa padaṭṭhānā

original: Keci pana imāsu ekekaṃ niyataṃ viratiṃ icchanti. Evaṃ kāmāvacarapaṭhamamahākusalacittena
analyzed: keci pana imāsu ekekam niyatam viratim icchanti evam kāmāvacara paṭhama mahā kusala cittena

original: ime tettiṃsa vā catuttiṃsa vā dhammā sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
analyzed: ime tettiṃsa vā catuttiṃsa vā dhammā sampayogam gacchanti iti veditabbā

original: Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyacittenāpi. Sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hi ettha viseso.
analyzed: yathā ca paṭhamena evam dutiya cittena api sa saṅkhāra bhāva mattam eva hi ettha visesaḥ

original: Puna tatiyena ñāṇavippayogato ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā veditabbā.
analyzed: puna tatiyena ñāṇa vippayogato ṭhapetvā amoham avasesā dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā veditabbā

original: Tathā catutthenāpi sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva viseso, paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā
analyzed: tathā catutthena api sa saṅkhāra bhāva mattam eva visesaḥ paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā

original: pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchanti. Somanassaṭṭhāne cettha upekkhāvedanā
analyzed: pītim avasesā pañcamena sampayogam gacchanti somanassa ṭṭhāne ca ittha upekkhā vedanā
paviṭṭhā sā pana iṭṭha aniṭṭha viparīta anubhavana lakkhaṇā pakkhapāta upacchedana rasā

original: Yathā ca pañcamena, evaṃ chaṭṭhenāpi. Sasaṅkhāramattameva hoti viseso. Sattamena
analyzed: yathā ca pañcamena evam chaṭṭhena api sa saṅkhāra mattam eva hoti visesaḥ sattamena

original: pana ṭhapetvā paññaṃ avasesā ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā dhammā honti, tathā aṭṭhamenāpi.
analyzed: pana ṭhapetvā paññam avasesāḥ ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā dhammāḥ honti tathā aṭṭhamena api

original: Sasaṅkhāramattameva viseso. Evaṃ tāva kāmāvacarakusalacetasikā veditabbā.
analyzed: sa saṅkhāra mattam eva visesaḥ evam tāva kāmāvacara kusala cetasikā veditabbā
upekkhā yutta cittesu na dukkha sukha pītiyaḥ
jāyanta iva pañca karuṇā muditā ādayaḥ

original: Avasesesu pana rūpāvacaracittasampayuttā rūpāvacarā, tattha paṭhamacittasampayuttā
analyzed: avasesesu pana rūpāvacara citta sampayuttā rūpāvacarā tattha paṭhama citta sampayuttā

original: tāva kāmāvacarapaṭhamacitte vuttesu ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ avasesā veditabbā. Viratiyo
analyzed: kāmāvacara paṭhama citte vuttesu ṭhapetvā virati ttayam avasesāḥ veditabbāḥ viratiyaḥ

original: pana kāmāvacarakusalalokuttaresveva uppajjanti, na aññesu. Dutiyena vitakkavajjā
analyzed: pana kāmāvacara kusala lokuttaresu eva uppajjanti na aññesu dutiyena vitakka vajjā

original: dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā. Tatiyena vicāravajjā ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā. Catutthena
analyzed: dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā tatiyena vicāravajjāḥ ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā catutthena

original: tato pītivajjā tiṃsa vā ekatiṃsa vā. Pañcamena tato karuṇāmuditāvajjā tiṃsa honti,
analyzed: tatas pīti vajjā tiṃsa vā ekatiṃsa vā pañcamena tatas karuṇā muditā vajjā tiṃsa honti

original: somanassaṭṭhāne upekkhā paviṭṭhā. Evaṃ rūpāvacarakusalacetasikā veditabbā.
analyzed: somanassa ṭṭhāne upekkhā paviṭṭhā evam rūpāvacara kusala cetasikā veditabbā

original: Arūpāvacaracittasampayuttā arūpāvacarā, te pana rūpāvacarapañcame vuttanayena veditabbā. Arūpāvacarabhāvovettha viseso.
analyzed: arūpāvacara citta sampayuttāḥ arūpāvacarā te pana rūpāvacara pañcame vutta nayena veditabbāḥ arūpāvacara bhāvaḥ vettha visesaḥ

original: Lokuttaracittasampayuttā lokuttarā, te pana paṭhamajjhānike maggacitte paṭhamarūpāvacaracitte
analyzed: lokuttara citta sampayuttā lokuttarā te pana paṭhama jhānike magga citte paṭhama rūpāvacara citte

original: veditabbā. Karuṇāmuditānamabhāvo ca niyataviratibhāvo ca lokuttarabhāvo cettha viseso.
analyzed: veditabbā karuṇā muditānam abhāvo ca niyata virati bhāvo ca lokuttara bhāvo ca ittha viseso
evam tāva kusala citta sampayutta cetasikā veditabbā

original: Akusalā pana cetasikā bhūmito ekavidhā kāmāvacarāyeva, tesu lobhamūlapaṭhamākusalacittasampayuttā
analyzed: akusalā pana cetasikā bhūmitaḥ ekavidhā tesu lobha mūla paṭhama akusala citta sampayuttā

original: tāva niyatā sarūpenāgatā pannarasa, yevāpanakā niyatā cattāroti ekūnavīsati honti.
analyzed: niyatā sarūpena āgatā ekūnavīsati honti

original: Aniyatā cha yevāpanakāti sabbe pañcavīsati honti. Seyyathidaṃ – phasso somanassavedanā
analyzed: aniyatā cha sabbe pañcavīsati honti sā iyyathidam phassaḥ somanassa vedanā

original: saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ
analyzed: saññā cetanā vitakko vicāraḥ pīti cittassa ekagga tā vīriyam jīvitam ahirikam anottappam

original: lobho moho micchādiṭṭhīti ime sarūpenāgatā pannarasa, chando adhimokkho uddhaccaṃ
analyzed: lobhaḥ mohaḥ micchādiṭṭhī iti ime sarūpena āgatā pannarasa chandaḥ adhimokkhaḥ uddhaccam

original: manasikāroti ime cattāro niyatayevāpanakā, ime pana paṭipāṭiyā dasasu cittesu niyatā
analyzed: manasikāraḥ ti ime cattāro ime pana paṭipāṭiyāḥ dasasu cittesu niyatā

original: honti, māno issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinamiddhanti ime chayeva aniyatayevāpanakā.
analyzed: honti māno issāḥ macchariyam kukkuccam thinam id hanti ime chayā iva aniyatayā iva apanakā
evam sabbe niyata aniyatāḥ dasa
niddiṭṭhā pāpa cittesu hata pāpena tādinā

original: Tattha phassoti akusalacittasahajāto phasso. Esa nayo sesesupi. Na hirīyatīti ahiriko,
analyzed: tattha phasso ti akusala citta sahajātaḥ phassaḥ esa nayo sesesu pi na hirīyati iti ahirikaḥ

original: ahirikassa bhāvo ahirikaṃ. Kāyaduccaritādīhi ottappatīti ottappaṃ, na ottappaṃ anottappaṃ.
analyzed: ahirikassa bhāvaḥ ahirikam kāya duccarita ādīhi ottappati iti ottappam na ottappam anottappam

original: Tattha kāyaduccaritādīhi ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṃ, alajjālakkhaṇaṃ vā ahirikaṃ, anottappaṃ
analyzed: tattha kāya duccarita ādīhi a jigucchana lakkhaṇam alajjā lakkhaṇam vā ahirikam anottappam

original: Lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho. So ārammaṇagahaṇalakkhaṇo
analyzed: lubbhanti tena sayam vā lubbhati lubbhana mattam eva vā lobho saḥ ārammaṇa gahaṇa lakkhaṇo

original: makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle pakkhittamaṃsapesi viya, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno
analyzed: makkaṭa ālepaḥ viya abhisaṅga rasaḥ tatta kapāle pakkhitta maṃsa pesi viya a pariccāga paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Muyhanti tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho. So cittassa andhabhāvalakkhaṇo,
analyzed: muyhanti tena sayam vā muyhati muyhana mattam eva vā tanti moho so cittassa andha bhāva lakkhaṇo

original: aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso, ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso vā, andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno,
analyzed: aññāṇa lakkhaṇaḥ vā a sampaṭivedha rasaḥ ārammaṇa sabhā avacchādana rasaḥ vā andhakāra paccupaṭṭhāno
a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhāno

original: Micchā passanti tāya, sayaṃ vā micchā passati, micchādassanamattameva vā esāti micchādiṭṭhi.
analyzed: micchā passanti tāya sayam vā micchā passati micchā dassana mattam eva va esā ati micchādiṭṭhi
sā ayoniso abhinivesa lakkhaṇā parāmāsa rasā micchā abhinivesa paccupaṭṭhānā ariyānam
a dassana kāma tā ādi padaṭṭhānā

original: Uddhatabhāvo uddhaccaṃ. Taṃ avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ vātābhighātacalajalaṃ viya, anavaṭṭhānarasaṃ
analyzed: uddhata bhāvaḥ uddhaccam tam a vūpasama lakkhaṇam vāta abhighāta cala jalam viya an avaṭṭhāna rasam
vāta abhighāta cala dhaja paṭākāḥ viya bhantatta paccupaṭṭhānam pāsāṇa abhighāta samuddhata bhasmaṃ
a yonisoma nasikāra padaṭṭhānam

original: Maññatīti māno. So uṇṇatilakkhaṇo, sampaggahaṇaraso, ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno, diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: maññati iti māno so uṇṇa ti lakkhaṇo sampaggahaṇa raso ketu kamya tā paccupaṭṭhāno diṭṭhi vippayutta lobha padaṭṭhāno

original: Issatīti issā. Sā parasampattīnaṃ usūyanalakkhaṇā, tattheva anabhiratirasā, tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, parasampattipadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: issati iti issā sā para sampattīnam usūyana lakkhaṇā tattha eva an abhirati rasā tatas vimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā para sampatti padaṭṭhānā

original: Maccharabhāvo macchariyaṃ. Taṃ attano sampattīnaṃ niguhaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, tāsaṃyeva parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaakkhamanarasaṃ, saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, attasampattipadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: macchara bhāvaḥ macchariyam tam attanaḥ sampattīnam niguhaṇa lakkhaṇam tāsam yeva parehi sādhāraṇa bhāva akkhamana rasam saṅkocana paccupaṭṭhānam atta sampatti padaṭṭhānam

original: Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ, tassa bhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ, vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: kucchitam katam kukatam tassa bhāvaḥ kukkuccam tam pacchā anutāpa lakkhaṇam kata akata anusocana rasam vippaṭisāra paccupaṭṭhānam kata akata padaṭṭhānam

original: Thinatā thinaṃ. Middhatā middhaṃ. Anussāhanasaṃsīdanatā, asattivighāto cāti attho.
analyzed: thina tā thinam middha tā middham anussāhana saṃsīdana tā asatti vighātaḥ ca ati attho

original: Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ. Tattha thinaṃ anussāhanalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyavinodanarasaṃ,
analyzed: thinam ca middham ca thinamiddham tattha thinam anussāhana lakkhaṇam vīriya vinodana rasam

original: ubhayampi ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Sesā kusale vuttanayena veditabbā.
analyzed: ubhayam pi a yonisoma nasikāra padaṭṭhānam sesā kusale vutta nayena veditabbā

original: Iti ime ekūnavīsati cetasikā paṭhamākusalacittena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
analyzed: iti ime ekūnavīsati cetasikā paṭhama akusala cittena sampayogam gacchanti iti veditabbā

original: Yathā ca paṭhamena, evaṃ dutiyenāpi. Sasaṅkhārabhāvo cettha thinamiddhassa niyatabhāvo

original: ca viseso. Tatiyena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ sesā aṭṭhārasa veditabbā. Māno

original: panettha aniyato hoti, diṭṭhiyā saha na uppajjatīti. Catutthena dutiye vuttesu ṭhapetvā

original: diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā. Etthāpi ca māno aniyato hoti. Pañcamena paṭhame vuttesu

analyzed: ṭhapetvā pītim avasesā sampayogam gacchanti iti somanassa ṭṭhāne pana ittha upekkhā paviṭṭhā

original: Chaṭṭhenāpi pañcame vuttasadisā eva. Sasaṅkhāratā, thinamiddhassa niyatabhāvo ca
analyzed: chaṭṭhena api pañcame vutta sadisā eva sa saṅkhāra tā thinamiddhassa niyata bhāvo ca

analyzed: visesaḥ sattamena pañcame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhim avasesā veditabbā mānaḥ pana ittha

original: aniyato. Aṭṭhamena chaṭṭhe vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā. Etthāpi māno
analyzed: aniyataḥ aṭṭhamena chaṭṭhe vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhim avasesā veditabbā ettha api māno

analyzed: domanassa sahagatesu paṭigha sampayuttesu dosa mūlesu dvīsu paṭhamena asaṅkhārikena

senti soka parāyaṇā

original: Nimitte ca pavatte ca, upaṭṭhāti anattato.

vavatthapeti saṅkhāya lakkhaṇāni vicakkhaṇaḥ

nimitta phala nipphannam tam attham adhimuccati

bhaya āvaha niyāmena bādha kantā iva passati

original: Tathā hi paccayārabbha, saṅkhārā nissayanti ce;
analyzed: tathā hi paccaya ārabbha saṅkhārāḥ nissayanti ce
tatovassam bhavissanti mahat bhaya samohitā
nirodha dhammā jāyanti salla viddhā ava dukkhitā
jarā āturāḥ vipajjantā bhijjantā ava vighātinaḥ
tena iva aniccataḥ diṭṭhāḥ dukkha bhāvena khāyare
saṅkhata ttā sabhāvaḥ hi dukkhāya parivattati

original: Aniccā puna saṅkhārā, dukkhāti ca vavatthitā;
analyzed: aniccāḥ puna saṅkhārāḥ dukkhā ati ca vavatthitā
nidassenti sa lakkhaṇam
katham atta para adhīnā paccaya uppanna bhaṅgurā
vipatti niyatā vā atha bādhamānā bhaya āvahā
āhacca ākāra bhedena tividhā hi vipassanā
aniccā dukkha anattā ti ayam ettha vinicchayo
tidhā bhūtā pahāna ākāra bheditā
mahāvipassanā nāma aṭṭhārasavidhā katham
hetu sāmaggi nipphannam aniccanti ti lakkhaṇam
aniccatam vipassantaḥ nicca saññam vimuñcati
anicca tāya adhiṭṭhāna nimittam pana passato
animitte vimuccantī animitta anupassanā
nirujjhamāna dhammānam byanti bhāvam vipassato
samudayam pajahantī nirodha anupassanā
sithilāḥ jātu nissārāḥ dubbalāḥ lahu ghātinaḥ
khaya dhammā ati saṅkhāya ghana saññam vimuñcati

tattha putte sūtipa jāḥ viya
an avattita bhāvānam aññathattam vipassato
vikāra pariṇāmesu dhuva saññā virajjati
ālambam ca tad ālamba ñāṇa bhaṅgam ca bhāvayan

original: Iccāniccānimittā ca, nirodhā ca khayā vayā;
analyzed: ca nirodhā ca khayā vayā

tam tam ākāram ārabbha tathā bāhulya vuttitaḥ
tad lakkhaṇa anugatā ca bhedā tassa iva sattadhā
sukha saññam nissajjantī vuttā dukkha anupassanā
nibbinnā nibbida āñāṇam virāgā rāga vajjitā

nirālaya abhinivesā ādīnava anupassanā
pañca anupassanā bhedam tat idam dukkha dassanam
sukha saññā ādi bhaṅgāya pavattanti pakāsitam
an attataḥ vipassantaḥ atta saññā vimuccati
jahata tta abhinivesam jhāyantaḥ puna suññatas
dvaya anupassanā bheda manatta ākāra dassanam
atta saññā abhinivesam vimokkhāya vibhāvitum
paṭinissaggataḥ disvā saṅkhāresu ti lakkhaṇam
jahantaḥ saṅkhata ādānam pakkhandati a saṅkhate

moha tā bhoga vimuttā paṭisaṅkhā anupassanā

original: Bhaṅge ñāṇaṃ bhaye ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇamādīnavepi ca.

original: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, adhimokkho ca paggaho;

original: Leṇaṃ tāṇaṃ patiṭṭhā vā, saraṇaṃ vā na vijjati.

vipatti avaṭṭa patitā maraṇa ābaddha nicchayā
moha ndhakāra pihitā catur ogha sama utthaṭā
vitunnāḥ dukkha sallena vihaññanti vighātinaḥ

suddhaḥ suhitaḥ vamitam viya
su vilittaḥ iva duggandham su nhātaḥ aṅgaṇam viya

saṅkhāre pi na abhinandati

nibbindantaḥ tatas tehi parimuccitum icchati

paccuppanna ādi ālambam nirutti paṭisambhidā
ñāṇassa ati idam ca ivam sati yujjati na aññathā
sadda abhidheyya saṅkha ādi iti ce sabba vatthunam
paññāpetabbataḥ hoti paññatti pada saṅgahaḥ
sabbe paññatti dhammā ti desetabbam tathā sati
atha paññāpanassa api paññāpetabba vatthunam

original: Vibhāgaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ hi, tathuddeso katoti ce;
analyzed: vibhāgam ñāpana tham hi tathā uddeso kataḥ iti ce
na kattabbam visum tena paññatti patha saṅgaham
catūhi paññattā ādi padehi sā
parehi paññāpanattāḥ iti ācariyā abravum
rūpa ādayaḥ upādāya paññāpetabbataḥ kira
a vijjamāna upādāya paññatti paṭhamā tatas
sota viññāṇa santāna anantaram patta jātinā
gahita pubba saṅketa manodvārika cetasā
paññāpenti gahitāya yāya satta ratha ādayaḥ

original: Iti sā nāmapaññatti, dutiyāti ca kittitā.
analyzed: iti sā
saddataḥ añña nāma avabodhena attha avabodhanam
kiccha sādhanataḥ pubba nayaḥ eva pasaṃsiyaḥ
sā vijjamāna paññatti tathā a vijjamāna tā
vijjamānena ca a vijjamānā tad biparītakā
a vijjamānena vijjamāna tap biparītakā
icca itā chabbidhā tāsu paṭhamā mati ādikā
sattaḥ saddhaḥ narussāhaḥ
seniyaḥ mana cetanā
iti ca ivam etā viññeyyā
kamataḥ dutiya ādikā
evam lakkhaṇataḥ ñatvā
sat ca dvayam asaṅkaram
kātabbaḥ pana vohāro
viññūhi na yathā tathā iti
iti sacca saṅkhepe nibbānapaññattiparidīpanaḥ nāma
pañcamo paricchedo
sacca saṅkhepaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ
